00037 #include "egs_track_scoring.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_TrackScoring::EGS_TrackScoring(const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00042     EGS_AusgabObject(Name,f), m_pts(0), m_start(0), m_stop(1024), m_lastCase(-1),
00043     m_nScore(0), m_bufSize(16), m_score(false), m_didScore(false),
00044     m_score_photons(true), m_score_electrons(true), m_score_positrons(true), m_fnExtra("") {
00045     otype = "EGS_TrackScoring";
00046 }
00047 
00048 EGS_TrackScoring::~EGS_TrackScoring() {
00049     if (m_pts) {
00050         delete m_pts;
00051     }
00052 }
00053 
00054 void EGS_TrackScoring::setApplication(EGS_Application *App) {
00055     EGS_AusgabObject::setApplication(App);
00056     if (!app) {
00057         return;
00058     }
00059     if (m_pts) {
00060         delete m_pts;
00061         m_pts = 0;
00062     }
00063     if (m_bufSize < 1) {
00064         m_bufSize = 1024;
00065     }
00066     string fname(app->getOutputFile());
00067     fname += m_fnExtra;
00068     if (!egsIsAbsolutePath(fname)) {
00069         fname = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),fname);
00070     }
00071     int i_parallel = -1;
00072     if (app->getNparallel() > 1) {
00073         i_parallel = app->getIparallel();
00074     }
00075     if (i_parallel >= 0) {
00076         char buf[16];
00077         sprintf(buf,"_w%d",i_parallel);
00078         fname += buf;
00079     }
00080     fname += ".ptracks";
00081     m_pts = new EGS_ParticleTrackContainer(fname.c_str(),m_bufSize);
00082 
00083     description = "\nParticle Track Scoring (";
00084     description += name;
00085     description += ")\n";
00086     description += "======================================================\n";
00087     description += " - Scoring photon tracks       = ";
00088     description += m_score_photons ? "YES\n" : "NO\n";
00089     description += " - Scoring electron tracks     = ";
00090     description += m_score_electrons ? "YES\n" : "NO\n";
00091     description += " - Scoring positron tracks     = ";
00092     description += m_score_positrons ? "YES\n" : "NO\n";
00093     description += " - First event to score        = ";
00094     char buf[32];
00095     sprintf(buf,"%lld\n",m_start);
00096     description += buf;
00097     description += " - Last event to score         = ";
00098     sprintf(buf,"%lld\n",m_stop);
00099     description += buf;
00100     description += " - Track buffer size           = ";
00101     sprintf(buf,"%d\n",m_bufSize);
00102     description += buf;
00103     description += " - Output file name            = ";
00104     description += fname;
00105     description += "\n\n";
00106 }
00107 
00108 void EGS_TrackScoring::reportResults() {
00109     egsInformation("\nParticle Track Scoring (%s)\n",name.c_str());
00110     egsInformation("======================================================\n");
00111     egsInformation("   Total events scored:     %lld\n",m_nScore);
00112     if (m_pts) {
00113         m_pts->reportResults(false);
00114     }
00115 }

00117 
00118 extern "C" {
00119 
00120     EGS_TRACK_SCORING_EXPORT EGS_AusgabObject *createAusgabObject(EGS_Input *input,
00121             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00122         const static char *func = "createAusgabObject(track_scoring)";
00123         if (!input) {
00124             egsWarning("%s: null input?\n",func);
00125             return 0;
00126         }
00127         vector<string> sc_options;
00128         sc_options.push_back("no");
00129         sc_options.push_back("yes");
00130         bool scph = input->getInput("score photons",sc_options,true);
00131         bool scel = input->getInput("score electrons",sc_options,true);
00132         bool scpo = input->getInput("score positrons",sc_options,true);
00133         if (!scph && !scel && !scpo) {
00134             return 0;
00135         }
00136         EGS_I64 first = 0, last = 1024;
00137         input->getInput("start scoring",first);
00138         input->getInput("stop scoring",last);
00139         int bufSize = 1024;
00140         input->getInput("buffer size",bufSize);
00141         string fnExtra;
00142         input->getInput("file name addition",fnExtra);
00143         EGS_TrackScoring *result = new EGS_TrackScoring("",f);
00144         result->setScorePhotons(scph);
00145         result->setScoreElectrons(scel);
00146         result->setScorePositrons(scpo);
00147         result->setFirstEvent(first);
00148         result->setLastEvent(last);
00149         result->setBufferSize(bufSize);
00150         result->setFileNameExtra(fnExtra);
00151         result->setName(input);
00152         return result;
00153     }
00154 
00155 }
